mapper.select: SELECT b.wo_idx, b.wo_name, a.ch_idx FROM sm_insp_change a JOIN sm_work_order b ON a.WO_IDX = b.WO_IDX WHERE a.CH_RECYCLE = 'Y' AND a.ch_idx NOT IN (SELECT ch_idx FROM sm_reversal)
SELECT item_cd, item_name FROM sm_item WHERE item_type= '자재'
SELECT item_name FROM sm_item WHERE item_cd = #{itemCd}

SELECT d.ac_name, e.item_name, a.wo_pdt_cnt, a.wo_group, f.ch_idx FROM sm_work_order a JOIN sm_orders b ON a.OR_IDX=b.OR_IDX JOIN sm_estimate c ON b.ES_IDX = c.ES_IDX JOIN sm_account d ON c.A_IDX = d.AC_CODE JOIN sm_item e ON a.ITEM_CD = e.ITEM_CD JOIN sm_insp_change f ON f.WO_IDX = a.WO_IDX WHERE a.WO_IDX = #{woIdx}

SELECT a.re_idx, a.wo_idx, c.wo_name, g.item_name, DATE_FORMAT(a.di_reg_dte, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS di_reg_dte, a.wo_group, f.ac_name, a.re_cnt, a.re_manager, a.item_cd1, a.item_name1, a.cnt1, a.item_cd2, a.item_name2, a.cnt2, a.item_cd3, a.item_name3, a.cnt3, a.item_cd4, a.item_name4, a.cnt4, a.item_cd5, a.item_name5, a.cnt5, a.item_cd6, a.item_name6, cnt6, a.item_cd7, a.item_name7, a.cnt7, a.item_cd8, a.item_name8, a.cnt8, a.item_cd9, a.item_name9, cnt9, a.item_cd10, a.item_name10, a.cnt10 FROM sm_reversal a JOIN sm_insp_change b ON a.WO_IDX = b.WO_IDX JOIN sm_work_order c ON a.WO_IDX = c.WO_IDX JOIN sm_orders d ON c.OR_IDX = d.OR_IDX JOIN sm_estimate e ON d.ES_IDX = e.ES_IDX JOIN sm_account f ON e.A_IDX = f.AC_CODE JOIN sm_item g ON c.ITEM_CD = g.ITEM_CD WHERE a.re_idx = #{reIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_reversal( re_idx, wo_idx, di_reg_dte, di_reg_mem, re_cnt, wo_group, re_manager, ch_idx ,item_cd1, item_name1, cnt1 ,item_cd2, item_name2, cnt2 ,item_cd3, item_name3, cnt3 ,item_cd4, item_name4, cnt4 ,item_cd5, item_name5, cnt5 ,item_cd6, item_name6, cnt6 ,item_cd7, item_name7, cnt7 ,item_cd8, item_name8, cnt8 ,item_cd9, item_name9, cnt9 ,item_cd10, item_name10, cnt10 ) values( (SELECT CONCAT('RE', LPAD((SELECT (SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(a.re_idx),0) FROM sm_reversal a),'[a-z]','')))+1,10,0))), #{woIdx}, NOW(), #{userId}, #{woPdtCnt}, #{woGroup}, #{reManager}, #{chIdx} ,#{itemCd1}, #{itemName1}, #{cnt1} ,#{itemCd2}, #{itemName2}, #{cnt2} ,#{itemCd3}, #{itemName3}, #{cnt3} ,#{itemCd4}, #{itemName4}, #{cnt4} ,#{itemCd5}, #{itemName5}, #{cnt5} ,#{itemCd6}, #{itemName6}, #{cnt6} ,#{itemCd7}, #{itemName7}, #{cnt7} ,#{itemCd8}, #{itemName8}, #{cnt8} ,#{itemCd9}, #{itemName9}, #{cnt9} ,#{itemCd10}, #{itemName10}, #{cnt10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sm_work_order SET wo_pdt_cnt = wo_pdt_cnt + ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(cnt1, 0) + IFNULL(cnt2, 0) + IFNULL(cnt3, 0) + IFNULL(cnt4, 0) + IFNULL(cnt5, 0) + IFNULL(cnt6, 0) + IFNULL(cnt7, 0) + IFNULL(cnt8, 0) + IFNULL(cnt9, 0) + IFNULL(cnt10, 0)), 0) FROM sm_reversal WHERE sm_reversal.wo_idx = sm_work_order.wo_idx ) WHERE wo_idx = #{woIdx}
update sm_prod_result set pr_re_re_st = 'N' where wo_idx = #{woIdx} and pr_list_nm = '혼합'
update sm_prod_result set pr_re_re_st = 'N' where wo_idx = #{woIdx} and pr_list_nm = '혼합/반응'
update sm_process set pr_cur_seq = 3, pr_cur_idx = 'PR-001-003', pr_cur_nm = '품질검사', pr_fin_cnt = 2 where wo_idx = #{woIdx}
update sm_process set pr_cur_seq = 4, pr_cur_idx = 'PR-002-004', pr_cur_nm = '품질검사', pr_fin_cnt = 3 where wo_idx = #{woIdx}
